#summary Release Notes

= Release Notes =
== May 30, 2012 ==
Released version 0.9.4.
  * Updated library to the latest Google Chart Tools release (May 02, 2012)
  * Workaround for automatically resizing GeoCharts
  * Small fixes and more documentation
== April 30, 2012 ==
Released version 0.9.3.  
  * Introduced [https://developers.google.com/chart/interactive/docs/reference#google_visualization_charteditor ChartEditor]
  * Several bug fixes
  * Documentation improvements  
== April 10, 2012 ==
Released version 0.9.2
  * Fixes several layout issues.  
  * Created a basic [http://gwt-charts.appspot.com/ Showcase].
== April 04, 2012 ==
Released version 0.9.1
  * Attach/detach support for all charts and parent elements
== March 30, 2012 ==
Released version 0.9.0
  * First release
